Hope you guys have a nice holiday (those who celebrate this one) and I posted a couple related evp in my file section for yall. Didnt get that message today just some mention of the bird LOL but dont have alot of time to record before work.
   
  Yeah I gotta work it.
   
  Attaching them here for a few to make it easier for those who cant get on group at the moment.
   
  Misty
